message.entry: TSPAN must have at least 3 entries.
The entries of TSPAN must be strictly increasing.
When M > 0, XMESH(1) must be non-negative.
XMESH must have at least 3 entries.
The entries of XMESH must be strictly increasing.
Invalid output of ICFUN. ICFUN must return a column vector.
Unexpected output of PDEFUN. For this problem PDEFUN must return three column vectors of length {0}.
Unexpected output of BCFUN. For this problem BCFUN must return four column vectors of length {0}.
Spatial discretization has failed. Discretization supports only parabolic and elliptic equations, with flux term involving spatial derivative.
Time integration has failed. Solution is available at requested time points up to t={0}.
Problem description must have at least one parabolic equation.
